nodes.text: Raven was a group of siz escort shuttles used by the Ripoblus. They were used in the final stage of the Empire's campaign to end the Sepan Civil War. Launching from the Nebulon-B2 frigate Shemsher to interfere with the Victory-class Star Destroyer Protector's retrieval of TIE Avengers from Escort Carrier Tropsobor. The Escort shuttles were destroyed in the battle.
